container.dark: border border-gray-900 rounded-lg text-gray-200 bg-gray-900 shadow

navPopoverContainer.light: rounded-lg text-sm font-semibold text-white bg-gray-800 border border-gray-700 py-1 shadow
navPopoverContainer.dark: rounded-lg text-sm font-semibold text-gray-800 bg-white border border-gray-100 py-1 shadow

navTitle.light: text-{color}-100 font-bold hover:bg-gray-900 cursor-pointer px-2 py-1 rounded
navTitle.dark: text-gray-900 font-bold hover:bg-gray-200 cursor-pointer px-2 py-1 rounded

dayPopoverContainer.light: rounded text-xs text-white font-medium bg-gray-800 border border-gray-700 px-2 py-1 shadow
dayPopoverContainer.dark: rounded text-xs text-gray-900 font-medium bg-white border border-gray-200 px-2 py-1 shadow

datePickerInput: shadow appearance-none border rounded w-full py-2 px-3 text-gray-800 bg-white leading-tight focus:outline-none focus:shadow-outline
datePickerInputDrag: shadow appearance-none border rounded w-full py-2 px-3 text-gray-400 bg-white leading-tight focus:outline-none focus:shadow-outline
